snippet: General Motors is recalling 316,357 vehicles in North America because their low-beam headlights or daytime running lamps could stop working.
abstract: General Motors is recalling 316,357 vehicles in North America because their low-beam headlights or daytime running lamps could stop working.
lead_paragraph: General Motors is recalling 316,357 vehicles in North America because their low-beam headlights or daytime running lamps could stop working.

headline.main: G.M. Recalls Vehicles for Headlight Problem
headline.print_headline: G.M. Recalls Vehicles for Headlight Problem
